entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Burk's Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:27 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Precipitation, 0.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Muskoka Airport 9:56 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
Condition: Precipitation
Temperature: 0.8°C
Pressure: 100.8 kPa
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 95 %
Dewpoint: 0.1°C
Wind: ENE 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing rain or rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Rain or freezing rain changing to freezing rain or ice pellets this evening then to snow mixed with ice pellets near midnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. Temperature steady near plus 1. Wind chill minus 3 in the morning. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 3 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
